name: open-evince
description: open the document viewer from the Tizen Desktop

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top-left part of the desktop
Click then on "Utilities" on the left

author: elebideau

name: open-pdf
description: Open a pdf from the file manager and check if Evince starts and display the document
pre_condition: Have a pdf file in your home directory

steps.description: Double-click on the pdf file in your home directory
steps.expected: Evince starts and the document is correctly displayed

author: elebideau

name: open-pdf-evince
description: Check if Evince is able to open pdf files when started
pre_condition: Have Evince started and have a pdf file in the home directory

steps.description: Click on the wheel settings icon on the right
In the drop-down menu, click on "Open..."
Select the pdf file in the home directory

steps.expected: The pdf file is open in Evince and correctly displayed

author: elebideau

name: fullscreen
objective: open a pdf file with evince in fullscreen mode
description: Check if Evince is able to display a pdf file in fullscreen mode
pre_condition: Have a pdf file open with Evince

steps.description: In Evince, click on the tools icon on the right
In the drop-down menu, click on "Fullscreen"
steps.expected: The pdf file is correctly displayed in fullscreen mode

author: elebideau

name: print-pdf
objective: Print a pdf file from Evince
description: Check if the Evince is able to start the printing manager
pre_condition: Have a printer connected to the system and correctly configured, have a pdf file open in Evince

steps.description: Click on "File" in the top-left bar

steps.expected: The pdf document is correctly printed

author: elebideau
